data.text:
This was our second visit to Atrium Palace and it didn't disappoint.  We stayed in a Deluxe Villa with Private Pool which is a lovely spacious room with a good size pool to splash about in.  The hotel has a lovely feel to it  - it's one of those places where you feel immediately at home, and all the staff are friendly and helpful.  

We've already booked our third visit for 2024 and can't wait to return.
data.title: Lovely relaxing hotel

data.text:
Lovely hotel, we had really good food. Some of the best buffet food & food choices we have experienced in any Greek hotel.  Staff were all very helpful 
Great pool there & spa area also. Lots of sun beds. Never a problem finding any free ones
We really hope to return again next summer.
data.title: Lovely hotel hope to return

data.text: It is a bit dated hotel but the friendliness and service are in-line with at the Atrium hotel chain standards. What I liked most was the dense, almost tropical, vegetation and the main pool with the integrated bar. Overall, the highest possible value in this price range.
data.title: A value for money hotel with genuinely friendly people

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for your kind words and for taking the time to share your experience. We're delighted to hear that our service and friendliness met the high standards associated with our Atrium Hotels & Resorts. It's wonderful to know that the lush vegetation and our main pool with the integrated bar were highlights of your stay. We strive to provide the best value for our guests, and we're glad you found your stay to be of excellent value. We look forward to welcoming you back for another enjoyable visit!
owner_response.author: Atrium Hotels and Resorts

data.text:
Best best best holiday ever!

We originally had booked to stay at the Atrium Platinum resort but this was cancelled with 2 weeks to go and Atrium offered us an upgrade at the Palace resort on the east coast. Naturally we jumped at the chance but this wasn't just an upgrade.

The hotel was amazing, pure luxury and probably a holiday that we will never be able to replicate!

The staff really made it a holiday to remember. They really couldn't do enough to help and as we left we bumped into the hotel manager and we had to let him know how proud he should be of his amazing team.

We have to mention Gabriella, Davida, Artiola, Zuzanna, Valentina, Marianna, Katerina, Beatrice and Pari as they obviously worked so hard and made us feel so welcome. Thank you guys!

We got to stay in a superior villa which had loads of room, enough for myself and my wife to have some privacy. It also had a jacuzzi and beautiful private pool which was cleaned every day. The villa was visited by cleaning staff at least twice a day which seemed nuts but the hotel obviously prided itself on keeping everything in a wonderful state.

Three days into the holiday we were offered an upgrade to the presidential villa! It was becoming available and would we like to use it for the remainder of our stay? The superior villa had more than enough room but the presidential villa was crazy big. It had a large separate room for our two daughters which meant that me and my wife had even more privacy. The private, heated pool actually wrapped around the side of the building and we couldn't believe how lucky we were.

The food and restaurants at the hotel were really what interested me the most. This was definitey not quantity over quality. It was just sheer quality and I woke up every day giddy with the thought of the variety available to us - local fish, anchovies, dolmades, freshly baked bread, a huge variety of salad, grains, humus, tzatziki and the list goes on, always too much to choose from. Our daughters were in heaven and had cake for breakfast each day and we didn't care because we knew they would burn it off in the huge pools. Every meal turned into a 3, 4 or 5 course affair.

I used the hotel gym most days and it was really well kitted out. Multiple sets of weights in different forms, kettle bells, dumbells, different bars, multiple cross trainers and multiple treadmills and rowing machines. It was super clean and was happily child free!

The icing on the cake was how well the hotel and grounds were looked after. It was a pleasure to walk around and the holiday wasn't just about getting from our room to the pool, restaurant or beach. The paths were all tiled beautifully, the many many flower beds maintained perfectly and the creeping/hanging plants were in flower and gave the hotel a peaceful, paradise feel.

It's safe to say we were sad to leave. We may never have a holiday like that again but the team at Atrium made it one to remember.
data.title: A genuinely astonishing place

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you so much for taking the time to share such a delightful review of your stay at our resort. We are thrilled to hear that your holiday with us was amazing!

Your kind words about the luxury of the hotel, the dedicated efforts of our staff, and the exceptional experience you had are truly heartwarming. Gabriella, Davida, Artiola, Zuzanna, Valentina, Marianna, Katerina, Beatrice, Pari, and the rest of our team will be absolutely elated to hear your praise. Recognizing their hard work is incredibly rewarding.

We're also glad that the upgrade to the presidential villa added to the magic of your stay and that our culinary offerings left such a lasting impression. Your appreciation for the well-maintained gym, beautiful grounds, and overall atmosphere of the resort means a great deal to us.

Thank you again for choosing the Atrium Palace for your memorable holiday. We hope that we will have the pleasure of welcoming you and your family back for another extraordinary experience in the future.

Warm regards,
owner_response.author: Atrium Hotels and Resorts

data.text: Beautiful room with own pool, lots of space with a very comfy bed. Dining options were exceptional and the service was friendly and super-efficient, can honestly say that nothing was too much trouble for any member of the team. Great for families and couples alike. Really enjoyed my stay.
data.title: Fantastic hotel with exceptional service

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

thank you for taking the time to share your wonderful experience at our hotel. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your room with its own pool and found the bed comfortable and the space ample for your needs.

Your compliments on our dining options and the exceptional service provided by our team are greatly appreciated. We always strive to ensure that every guest feels well taken care of and it's rewarding to know that we succeeded in making your stay enjoyable.

We're also glad to hear that you found our hotel suitable for both families and couples. It is our goal to create a welcoming and versatile environment for all our guests.

Thank you once again for choosing to stay with us and for your kind words. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the near future for another enjoyable stay.

Warm regards,
owner_response.author: Atrium Hotels and Resorts
